Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Handles button action events. Also fired by a Timer object in the superclass Game that uses it to update the UI. Periodically checks whether blobert is overlapping an apple or ghost and handles the game accordingly.
